what_you_do: Brenda Lee is a resilience strategist and founder of Modig Leadership, trusted by Fortune 10 leaders, law enforcement teams, and emotionally exhausted executives.
who_you_serve: Fortune 10 executive teams and boards, first responder agencies, healthcare leadership and burnout prevention units, corporate leaders managing high-stakes people operations, founders navigating M&As, pivots, or personal collapse, leadership retreats, masterminds, and private summits.
social_proof: Known for her no-fluff delivery, Brenda equips high-performers with clarity, control, and emotional edge when everything breaks—without therapy, journaling, or falling apart.
signature_programs: Rebuilding After Burnout, Betrayal, or Breakdown, Leading When You're at Capacity, The Unspoken Cost of High Performance, The Emotional Reset Every Leader Needs, Real-World Resilience for Teams Under Fire, Leading Through Divorce Without Losing Yourself
business_focus: Brenda Lee is a resilience strategist and founder of Modig Leadership, trusted by Fortune 10 leaders, law enforcement teams, and emotionally exhausted executives.
